faqs.question: What are the basic eligibility criteria for joining Merchant Navy?
faqs.answer: Candidates must be Indian nationals with 10+2 pass (Science stream with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics). Age should be 17-25 years at the time of admission to Maritime institutes. Medical fitness as per DGS standards is mandatory.

faqs.question: Is 10+2 Science mandatory for Merchant Navy?
faqs.answer: Yes, 10+2 Science with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics is mandatory for joining Merchant Navy courses through IMU-CET. This is a standard requirement set by Indian Maritime University.

faqs.question: What is the age limit for Merchant Navy officers?
faqs.answer: The ideal age for joining Maritime Academy is 17-25 years. Some institutes may have relaxations up to 28 years for certain categories. Age is calculated as on the date of admission.

key_facts.fact: Maximum age: 25 years (28 for reserved categories)
Medical fitness: As per DGS (Directorate General of Shipping) norms
Vision: 6/6 correctable to 6/6 in each eye
